item.description:
Procrastinators' Study Hall #2
Monday: 1:00 - 3:30 PM

Have things that you should be working on? Want some help keeping on track? Hoping to meet others who are also available on a weekday afternoon? Well then, bring your work, a positive attitude and a resolution to get things done and let's change all that!

We'll each grab a drink and share our goals for the "study session" and then get to work. With so many members who are self-employed, unemployed, in graduate school, etc. it's nice to know we are not alone.

** Don't worry if you need to come late or leave early...you are still welcome to join us!

** If you drive to Davis Square, be sure to bring plenty of quarters for the meters!

** Walk all the way to the back...I'll try to grab the big table in the back left corner.
item.how_to_find_us: There will be a small brown basket in the center of the table...probably filled with writing utensils
item.name: Time for Coffee
